result.execSummary:
The defendant Romello R Anderson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Romello R Anderson is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Romello R Anderson was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes:
Court sentenced defendant to serve 4 days in the HOC with credit for 4 days time served for a TIME SERVED DISPOSITION.

If the defendant completes 50 hours of community service and commits no new violatioins of the law, Court will grant expungement.


Court ordered defendant to pay all costs and surcharges by 10-14-2015 or, as a penalty if not paid convert to a civil judgment.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Romello R Anderson

records.addlTxt: Defendant's Bail Forfeiture Notice returned undeliverable.
Notice of bond forfeiture mailed to defendant; Original in file. ($250 sig bond) gj

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Romello R Anderson
Current: 2037 N. 40TH STREET, Milwaukee, WI 53208-1866 United States  (Effective: 03-10-2016)
Prior: 3769 North 37th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53216
Due to the defendant's failure to appear, Court will not grant expungement.
Defendant Romello R Anderson not in court.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court ordered bench warrant withdrawn.  Recall issued.
Signature bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 250.00.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.
Attorney Colin P. McGinn in court prior to case being called.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant failing to appear 10/15/15, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.

Defendant Romello R Anderson in court with attorney Colin P. McGinn.  Defendant Romello R Anderson in custody.  Sara Nicole Volden Schroeder appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.

AS TO COUNT 1:  Pursuant to plea negotiations and on motion of the State, Court ordered count dismissed.

AS TO COUNT 2:  Defendant changes his plea to GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to his plea, advised of his Constitutional rights and the maximum penalty.   Defendant advised that if not a United States Citizen, deportation is possible.  Court found that defendant knowingly, voluntarily and intelligently waived his rights.  Guilty Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea.  Court found defendant guilty and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record.  

Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant.  Court sentenced defendant to serve 4 DAYS in the House of Correction with credit for 4 days served FOR A TIME SERVED DISPOSITION.  Court ordered defendant to pay ALL COSTS and SURCHARGES by 10-14-2015 or, as a penalty if not paid, convert to a civil judgment.  

If the defendant completes 50 hours of community service and commits no new violations of the law, Court will grant expungement.
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief received and filed.  Court ordered case adjourned for review hearing in Branch 24.  Review hearing scheduled for October 15, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Colin P. McGinn in court, defendant Romello R Anderson not in court, in custody.  Kimberly Dorice Schoepp appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  The defendant was not produced for today's hearing.  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 24.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for April 14, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Romello R Anderson in court with Attorney.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense just received discovery and offer.  Stipulation for agreed upon request for a new court date signed and filed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for April 8, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription, no drug paraphernalia or no dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Romello R Anderson in court with attorney Brian C. Hagner.  Defendant Romello R Anderson in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Protasiewicz, Branch 24.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 6, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
